mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq_category(faq_category_num, category_name, category_reg_id, category_reg_date, category_order, category_visible) VALUES(#{faq_category_num}, #{category_name}, 1, SYSDATE, #{faq_category_order}, #{category_visible})
mapper.select:
SELECT faq_category_num, category_name, u.user_name AS category_reg_id, category_reg_date, category_order, category_visible FROM faq_category f JOIN user1 u ON f.category_reg_id = u.userIdx WHERE faq_category_num IN
#{item}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq_board(faq_num, faq_category_num, faq_question, faq_content, faq_reg_id, faq_reg_date, faq_visible) VALUES(#{faq_num}, #{faq_category_num}, #{faq_question}, #{faq_content}, 1, SYSDATE, #{visible})
mapper.select:
SELECT faq_num, faq_question, faq_content, faq_visible AS visible FROM faq_board f WHERE faq_num IN
#{item}
mapper.update: UPDATE faq_board SET faq_question = #{faq_question}, faq_content = #{faq_content}, faq_update_id = 1, faq_update_date = SYSDATE, faq_visible = #{visible} WHERE faq_num = #{faq_num}
mapper.select: SELECT faq_category_num, category_name, u.user_name AS category_reg_id, TO_CHAR(category_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS category_reg_date, category_order, category_visible FROM faq_category f JOIN user1 u ON f.category_reg_id = u.userIdx

SELECT faq_num, fc.category_name, faq_question, faq_content, u.user_name AS faq_reg_id, TO_CHAR(faq_reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS faq_reg_date, faq_visible AS visible FROM faq_board f JOIN user1 u ON f.faq_reg_id = u.userIdx JOIN faq_category fc ON f.faq_category_num = fc.faq_category_num

SELECT inquiry_category_num, inquiry_category_name, u.user_name AS inquiry_category_reg_id, TO_CHAR(inquiry_category_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS inquiry_category_reg_date, inquiry_category_visible FROM inquiry_category i JOIN user1 u ON i.inquiry_category_reg_id = u.userIdx

SELECT inquiry_board_num,ic.category_name, inquiry_board_title, inquiry_board_content, u.user_name AS inquiry_board_reg_id, TO_CHAR(inquiry_board_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS inquiry_board_reg_date, inquiry_board_status FROM inquiry_board i JOIN user1 u ON i.inquiry_board_reg_id = u.userIdx JOIN inquiry_category ic ON ic.inquiry_category_num = i.inquiry_category_num

SELECT inquiry_answer_num, inquiry_board_num, b.inquiry_board_title, b.inquiry_board_content, u.user_name AS inquiry_answer_reg_id, inquiry_answer_title, inquiry_answer_content, TO_CHAR(inquiry_answer_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS inquiry_answer_reg_date, TO_CHAR(inquiry_answer_update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS inquiry_answer_update_date FROM inquiry_answer i JOIN user1 u ON i.inquiry_board_reg_id = u.userIdx JOIN inquiry_board b ON i.inquiry_board_num = b.inquiry_board_num
